description: Gets a subject, which associates a certificate identity with authentication attempts. The subject stores auditing information such as the status of the last authentication attempt, the certificate data used in the attempt, and the last time the associated identity attempted authentication. Required permissions: rolesanywhere:GetSubject.

parameters.name: subjectId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subject.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the subject was created.

nested_items.name: credentials
nested_items.description: The temporary session credentials vended at the last authenticating call with this subject.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the credential is enabled.

nested_items.name: failed
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the temporary credential request was successful.

nested_items.name: issuer
nested_items.description: The fully qualified domain name of the issuing certificate for the presented end-entity certificate.

nested_items.name: seenAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 time stamp of when the certificate was last used in a temporary credential request.

nested_items.name: serialNumber
nested_items.description: The serial number of the certificate.

nested_items.name: x509CertificateData
nested_items.description: The PEM-encoded data of the certificate.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: The enabled status of the subject.

nested_items.name: instanceProperties
nested_items.description: The specified instance properties associated with the request.

nested_items.name: failed
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the temporary credential request was successful.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: A list of instanceProperty objects.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: seenAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 time stamp of when the certificate was last used in a temporary credential request.

nested_items.name: lastSeenAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of the last time this subject requested temporary session credentials.

nested_items.name: subjectArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource.

nested_items.name: subjectId
nested_items.description: The id of the resource.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the subject was last updated.

nested_items.name: x509Subject
nested_items.description: The x509 principal identifier of the authenticating certificate.
